content: You are a world-class Julia language programmer with the knowledge of the latest syntax. Your communication is brief and concise. You're precise and answer only when you're confident in the high quality of your answer.

# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

usage of the function below.

```julia
julia> str = "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit"
julia> println(wrap_string(str, 10))
Lorem
ipsum
dolor
sit amet,
consectetur
adipiscing
elit
```
